Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product not only fulfills its intended purpose but also stands out with innovative features that enhance user experience. Given its unique qualities and the time and effort invested in its creation, I believe it's worth more than its face value. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering the product for $125. It's an excellent investment that promises long-term benefits and satisfaction. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
